titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Acid Yellow 219, Acid Orange 152, Acid Red 278, Acid Orange 116, Acid Orange 156, and Acid Blue 113.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/18/2002--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2007, the duty on Acid Yellow 219, Acid Orange 152, Acid Red 278, Acid Orange 116, Acid Orange 156, and Acid Blue 113.
